permissions.copyright-holder: MENC: The National Association for Music Education

p.bold: 2013 Symposium on Music Teacher Education: Navigating Crossroads
September 26-29, 2013 University of North Carolina at Greensboro

body.p: The 2013 Symposium on Music Teacher Education will be held September 26–29, 2013 at the University of North Carolina–Greensboro. The call for proposals encourages submissions focused on the 2013 symposium theme Navigating Crossroads. Proposals related to the work of the ASPAs and other topics in music teacher education are also welcomed. To submit a proposal, download the Submission Form, complete, and submit as indicated. Submissions will be accepted through April 15, 2013.

All forms and information about the 2013 Symposium can be found at http://smte.us by clicking on the Symposia link. Details are also available at http://musiced.nafme.org/category/interest-areas/society-for-music-teacher-education-smte/
Please direct all questions about the proposal submission process to David Rickels, SMTE Communications Chair, david.rickels@colorado.edu
